lines.text: Watch! That's powerful snorin'. Just like a hurricane!
From the motion picture of the same name.
Who's that down thar in the cellar?

[off-screen]
My name is Non-Stop Corrigan. I thought I was headed for Los Angeles. It was a mistake. My compass broke. Honest.
Ha, ha. In one of these here now cartoon pictures, a body can get away with anything.

[emerging from the audience as a silhouette on the screen]
Good night!
